channel.title: 🏢 Michigan State University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Michigan State University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Defensive Unlearning with Adversarial Training for Robust Concept Erasure in Diffusion Models
item.description: AdvUnlearn enhances diffusion model robustness against adversarial attacks during concept erasure by integrating adversarial training, improving the trade-off between robustness and model utility.
